train.question: Scientists launch a rocket into space for a mission. Once the rocket escapes the gravitational pull of Earth, how will the mass and weight of the rocket be affected?
choices: The mass and weight will change.
The mass and weight will stay the same.
The mass will stay the same, but the weight will change.
The mass will change, but the weight will stay the same.
cot: If an object escapes the gravitational pull of a planet then that object is no longer affected by the gravitational pull of that planet.
A rocket is a kind of object.
Earth is a kind of planet.
The gravitational force of a planet does not change the mass of an object on that planet or celestial body.
Gravity means gravitational pull.
Affected means changed.
Stay the same means not changing.
Weight means the force of gravity acting on an object.
To act on means to affect.
answer: The mass will stay the same, but the weight will change.

train.question: Animals may fight, make threatening sounds, and act aggressively toward members of the same species. These behaviors usually occur as the result of
cot: Competition may cause animals to fight towards members of their own species.
To cause means to result in.
Actions mean behavior.
Fighting is a kind of action.

train.question: Which is a characteristic of a sperm cell but not of an egg cell?
cot: A part of something means a characteristic of something.
A tail is not part of an egg cell.
A tail is a part of a sperm cell.
A part of something is present in that something.

train.question: A decomposer is an organism that
cot: A decomposer is a kind of living thing.
Decomposition is when a decomposer recycles nutrients from dead organisms to the soil by eating those dead organisms.
An organism is a living thing.

train.question: A parent and a child share several characteristics. Both individuals are tall, have curly hair, are good cooks, and have freckles. Which of these characteristics is a learned behavior?
cot: Skills are learned characteristics.
A behavior is a kind of characteristic.
Cooking is a kind of skill for preparing food.

train.question: Steven went to a farm and picked a bright red tomato from a broken branch on the plant. The tomato had a rotten spot with a worm inside of it. Instead of eating the tomato, Steven decided to plant the seeds and grow new tomato plants. Which characteristic of the tomato plant is inherited and could change over several generations?
cot: The colors of parts of an organism are inherited characteristics.
A tomato plant is a kind of plant.
A plant is a kind of organism.
Skin is a part of an animal.
Inherited characteristics can change over several generations.

train.question: Sharpening a pencil and tearing paper are examples of physical changes. Which statement describes why these are physical changes?
choices: There is a change in how the objects are used.
There is a change in the appearance of the objects.
There is a change in the materials from which the objects are made.
There is a change in both the appearance of the objects and the materials from which they are made.
cot: Shape is a property of the appearance of an object.
If something undergoes physical change then the chemical properties of that something will remain unchanged.
Material composition is a kind of chemical property.
Changed is the opposite of unchanged.
Composed of means made of.
If something undergoes a physical change then the physical properties of that something will change.
Appearance is a kind of physical property.
Sharpening an object causes that object to change shape.
A pencil is a kind of object.
Tearing an object changes that object 's shape.
A paper is a kind of object.
answer: There is a change in the appearance of the objects.

train.question: A student stands on a scale, and the scale reads 85 pounds. What is being measured by the scale?
choices: the force of gravity acting on the student
the air pressure surrounding the student
cot: A scale is used for measuring weight.
Weight means the force of gravity acting on an object.
A living thing is a kind of object.
An animal is a kind of living thing.
A human is a kind of animal.
A student is a kind of human.
answer: the force of gravity acting on the student

train.question: Anthony and Zach want to know how the temperature of the air affects the temperature of lake water. Which type of tool should they use to measure the temperatures?
cot: A thermometer is a kind of instrument for measuring temperature.
A thermometer is used to measure temperature.
Instrument means tool.
A type is synonymous with a kind.

train.question: Which of these dissolve in water?
cot: Sugar dissolves in water when they are combined.
A sugar cube is made of sugar.
